body:
Which mod do you think is the best? I personally think refusetostink is a very good moderator first of all she is very good at stoping when people are being annoying in chat, she is very active to and nice. But other than that I am not familiar with many other mods so I am leaving this debate mostly to you guys.

remember backup your opinions with facts and be respectful of others opinions!

title: Weekly debate 2: best/favorite Mod

replies.body: Why would this be a debatable topic. All mods are chosen for a reason due to the qualities and work ethic they have. There is no one objectively superior mod this is all subjective opinion and I feel this topic will just erupt into a flame war.
replies.body_tagged: Why would this be a debatable topic. All mods are chosen for a reason due to the qualities and work ethic they have. There is no one objectively superior mod this is all subjective opinion and I feel this topic will just erupt into a flame war.

replies.body: Not trying to be rude, but I think posts like these are made for popularity reasons. On topic, I like all staff equally and don't have a favourite. All the staff are great to me.
replies.body_tagged: Not trying to be rude, but I think posts like these are made for popularity reasons. On topic, I like all staff equally and don't have a favourite. All the staff are great to me.

replies.body: I agree with Luxe and Marcuz

replies.body: There have been many threads like these in the past, I don't see the point in having another one.
